name: Bounce'n Roll
description:
Bounce'n Roll Game made within 3 hours for Trijam #154!

Use the Arrow key, or WASD, or ZQSD to roll!

Collect as many coins as you can!

Credits

Thanks to https://distantlantern.itch.io/allsky-free-godot-edition for the sky box ✨ 

Thanks to https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle for the music 🎵
